metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14373 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A use after free was found in igc_reloc_struct_ptr() of psi/igc.c of ghostscript-9.25. A local attacker could supply a specially crafted PDF file to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14373` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.13
ghostscript-x - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.13
libgs9 - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.13
libgs9-common - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.13').
